Description: eSM module: System error detected:Error of class 3 forcedParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: System error detected:Error of class 4 forcedParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: Insufficientdeceleration for Quick StopParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Quick Stop ramp of drive lower thanQuick Stop ramp configured for eSM.
Correctives: Change ramp in eSM or drive.

Description: eSM module: Error detected duringSafe Operating Stop (SOS)Parameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Motor movement during SafeOperating Stop (SOS).
Correctives: Keep motor from moving while SafeOperating Stop is active (externalforces, loads).

Description: eSM module: Safely Limited Speed(SLS) exceeded in machineoperating mode Setup ModeParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
Cause: Delay for reaching Safely LimitedSpeed (SLS) too low or eSMdeceleration ramp too high.
Correctives: Increase delay for eSM control ofSafely Limited Speed (SLS) ordecrease eSM deceleration ramp forreaching Safely Limited Speed(SLS).

Description: eSM module: /ESTOP signal forEMERGENCY STOP triggeredParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
eSM module: Not ready for FaultResetParameter _WarnLatched Bit 23
Cause: eSM is in state Quick Stop Active orFault Reaction Active or Fault.
Correctives: Wait until eSM is no longer in stateQuick Stop Active or Fault ReactionActive or Fault or reboot the drive.

Description: eSM module: Not ready for eSMDisableParameter _WarnLatched Bit 23
Cause: Safety module eSM is not inoperating state Operation Enabled.
Correctives: eSM Disable requires the safetymodule eSM to be in operating stateOperation Enabled.

Description: eSM module: Parameter cannot bewritten in this operating stateParameter _WarnLatched Bit 23
Cause: Parameter cannot be written in thiseSM state.
Correctives: Change eSM state to write thisparameter.

Description: eSM module: Incorrect passwordParameter _WarnLatched Bit 23
Cause: The password that was sent by theconfiguration tool is not identical tothe password stored in the device.

Description: eSM module: Timeout duringparameter download (default valuesloaded)Parameter _WarnLatched Bit 23
eSM module: Parameter checksumcannot be written in this operatingstateParameter _WarnLatched Bit 23
Cause: eSM is not ready to be configured.
Correctives: Use correct password. Reconfiguresafety module eSM. Contact yourSchneider Electric servicerepresentative.

Description: eSM module: Parameter checksumincorrect (default values loaded)Parameter _WarnLatched Bit 23
Cause: EMI.The commissioning software isoutdated and not compatible with thesafety module eSM.
Correctives: Verify wiring (shield).Install latest commissioning softwareversion.
Verify the ambient conditions. Verifythat the flow of air is sufficient(pollution, objects).

Description: eSM module: System error detected:ESM5VDC undervoltageParameter _SigLatched Bit 23
